author: Gregor Kiczales
title: Team mates
question:
Some students in 110 like to have a problem set partner, or form a study group. I turned on post
https://piazza.com/class/ky0ewiregcz421?cid=5
that you can use to find other people who want to team up.
Note, of course, that for problem sets you can only consult one other person per problem set.  But for lecture review, problem bank, studying for exams you can form larger groups.
